OpenpilotEnabledToggle.title: Enable openpilot
OpenpilotEnabledToggle.description: Use the openpilot system for adaptive cruise control and lane keep driver assistance. Your attention is required at all times to use this feature. Changing this setting takes effect when the car is powered off.

ExperimentalLongitudinalEnabled.title: openpilot Longitudinal Control (Alpha)
ExperimentalLongitudinalEnabled.description:
WARNING: openpilot longitudinal control is in alpha for this car and will disable Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB).

On this car, openpilot defaults to the car's built-in ACC instead of openpilot's longitudinal control. Enable this to switch to openpilot longitudinal control. Enabling Experimental mode is recommended when enabling openpilot longitudinal control alpha.

ExperimentalMode.title: Experimental Mode
ExperimentalMode.description:
Openpilot defaults to driving in chill mode. Experimental mode enables alpha-level features that aren't ready for chill mode. Experimental features are listed below:

End-to-End Longitudinal Control
Let the driving model control the gas and brakes. openpilot will drive as it thinks a human would, including stopping for red lights and stop signs. Since the driving model decides the speed to drive, the set speed will only act as an upper bound. This is an alpha quality feature; mistakes should be expected.

Navigate on openpilot
When navigation has a destination, openpilot will input the map information into the model. This provides useful context for the model and allows openpilot to keep left or right appropriately at forks/exits. Lane change behavior is unchanged and still activated by the driver. This is an alpha quality feature; mistakes should be expected, particularly around exits and forks. These mistakes can include unintended lane line crossings, late exit taking, driving towards dividing barriers in the gore areas, etc.

New Driving Visualization
The driving visualization will transition to the road-facing wide-angle camera at low speeds to better show some turns. The Experimental mode logo will also be shown in the top right corner. When a navigation destination is set and the driving model is using it as input, the driving path on the map will turn green.

DisengageOnAccelerator.title: Disengage on Accelerator Pedal
DisengageOnAccelerator.description: When enabled, pressing the accelerator pedal will disengage openpilot.

IsLdwEnabled.title: Enable Lane Departure Warnings
IsLdwEnabled.description: Receive alerts to steer back into the lane when your vehicle drifts over a detected lane line without a turn signal activated while driving over 31 mph (50 km/h).

RecordFront.title: Record and Upload Driver Camera
RecordFront.description: Upload data from the driver-facing camera and help improve the driver monitoring algorithm.

IsMetric.title: Use Metric System
IsMetric.description: Display speed in km/h instead of mph.

NavSettingLeftSide.title: Show Map on Left Side of UI
NavSettingLeftSide.description: Show map on left side when in split-screen view.

AutomaticUpdates.title: Automatically Update FrogPilot
AutomaticUpdates.description: FrogPilot will automatically update itself and it's assets when you're offroad and connected to Wi-Fi.

AlwaysOnLateral.title: Always on Lateral
AlwaysOnLateral.description: Maintain openpilot lateral control when the brake or gas pedals are used. Deactivation occurs only through the 'Cruise Control' button.

AlwaysOnLateralLKAS.title: Control Via LKAS Button
AlwaysOnLateralLKAS.description: Enable or disable 'Always On Lateral' by clicking your 'LKAS' button.

AlwaysOnLateralMain.title: Enable On Cruise Main
AlwaysOnLateralMain.description: Enable 'Always On Lateral' by clicking your 'Cruise Control' button without requiring openpilot to be enabled first.

PauseAOLOnBrake.title: Pause On Brake Below
PauseAOLOnBrake.description: Pause 'Always On Lateral' when the brake pedal is being pressed below the set speed.

HideAOLStatusBar.title: Hide the Status Bar
HideAOLStatusBar.description: Don't use the status bar for 'Always On Lateral'.

ConditionalExperimental.title: Conditional Experimental Mode
ConditionalExperimental.description: Automatically switches to 'Experimental Mode' under predefined conditions.

CESpeed.title: Below
CESpeed.description: Switch to 'Experimental Mode' below this speed when not following a lead vehicle.

CESpeedLead.title: Below With Lead
CESpeedLead.description: Switch to 'Experimental Mode' below this speed when following a lead vehicle.

CECurves.title: Curve Detected Ahead
CECurves.description: Switch to 'Experimental Mode' when a curve is detected.

CELead.title: Lead Detected Ahead
CELead.description: Switch to 'Experimental Mode' when a slower or stopped lead vehicle is detected ahead.

CEModelStopTime.title: Model Wants To Stop In The Next
CEModelStopTime.description: Switch to 'Experimental Mode' when the model wants to stop like when it detects a stop light or stop sign.

CENavigation.title: Navigation Based
CENavigation.description: Switch to 'Experimental Mode' based on navigation data. (i.e. Intersections, stop signs, upcoming turns, etc.)

CESignal.title: Turn Signal When Below Highway Speeds
CESignal.description: Switch to 'Experimental Mode' when using turn signals below highway speeds to help assist with turns.

HideCEMStatusBar.title: Hide the Status Bar
HideCEMStatusBar.description: Don't use the status bar for 'Conditional Experimental Mode'.

DeviceManagement.title: Device Management
DeviceManagement.description: Tweak your device's behaviors to your personal preferences.

DeviceShutdown.title: Device Shutdown Timer
DeviceShutdown.description: Configure how quickly the device shuts down after going offroad.

NoLogging.title: Disable Logging
NoLogging.description: Turn off all data tracking to enhance privacy or reduce thermal load.

NoUploads.title: Disable Uploads
NoUploads.description: Turn off all data uploads to comma's servers.

IncreaseThermalLimits.title: Increase Thermal Safety Limit
IncreaseThermalLimits.description: Allow the device to run at a temperature above comma's recommended thermal limits.

LowVoltageShutdown.title: Low Voltage Shutdown Threshold
LowVoltageShutdown.description: Automatically shut the device down when your battery reaches a specific voltage level to prevent killing your battery.

OfflineMode.title: Offline Mode
OfflineMode.description: Allow the device to be offline indefinitely.

DrivingPersonalities.title: Driving Personalities
DrivingPersonalities.description: Manage the driving behaviors of comma's 'Personality Profiles'.

CustomPersonalities.title: Customize Personalities
CustomPersonalities.description: Customize the driving personality profiles to your driving style.

TrafficFollow.title: Following Distance
TrafficFollow.description: Set the minimum following distance when using 'Traffic Mode'. Your following distance will dynamically adjust between this distance and the following distance from the 'Aggressive' profile.

TrafficJerkAcceleration.title: Acceleration Jerk
TrafficJerkAcceleration.description: Customize the acceleration jerk when using 'Traffic Mode'.

TrafficJerkDanger.title: Danger Zone Jerk
TrafficJerkDanger.description: Customize the danger zone jerk when using the 'Traffic' personality.

TrafficJerkSpeed.title: Speed Control Jerk
TrafficJerkSpeed.description: Customize the speed control jerk when using 'Traffic Mode'.

AggressiveFollow.title: Following Distance
AggressiveFollow.description: Set the 'Aggressive' personality following distance. Represents seconds to follow behind the lead vehicle. Stock: 1.25 seconds.

AggressiveJerkAcceleration.title: Acceleration Jerk
AggressiveJerkAcceleration.description: Customize the acceleration jerk when using the 'Aggressive' personality.

AggressiveJerkDanger.title: Danger Zone Jerk
AggressiveJerkDanger.description: Customize the danger zone jerk when using the 'Aggressive' personality.

AggressiveJerkSpeed.title: Speed Control Jerk
AggressiveJerkSpeed.description: Customize the speed control jerk when using the 'Aggressive' personality.

StandardFollow.title: Following Distance
StandardFollow.description: Set the 'Standard' personality following distance. Represents seconds to follow behind the lead vehicle. Stock: 1.45 seconds.

StandardJerkAcceleration.title: Acceleration Jerk
StandardJerkAcceleration.description: Customize the acceleration jerk when using the 'Standard' personality.

StandardJerkDanger.title: Danger Zone Jerk
StandardJerkDanger.description: Customize the danger zone jerk when using the 'Standard' personality.

StandardJerkSpeed.title: Speed Control Jerk
StandardJerkSpeed.description: Customize the speed control jerk when using the 'Standard' personality.

RelaxedFollow.title: Following Distance
RelaxedFollow.description: Set the 'Relaxed' personality following distance. Represents seconds to follow behind the lead vehicle. Stock: 1.75 seconds.

RelaxedJerkAcceleration.title: Acceleration Jerk
RelaxedJerkAcceleration.description: Customize the acceleration jerk when using the 'Relaxed' personality.

RelaxedJerkDanger.title: Danger Zone Jerk
RelaxedJerkDanger.description: Customize the danger zone jerk when using the 'Relaxed' personality.

RelaxedJerkSpeed.title: Speed Control Jerk
RelaxedJerkSpeed.description: Customize the speed control jerk when using the 'Relaxed' personality.

OnroadDistanceButton.title: Onroad Distance Button
OnroadDistanceButton.description: Simulate a distance button via the onroad UI to control personalities, 'Experimental Mode', and 'Traffic Mode'.

ExperimentalModeActivation.title: Experimental Mode Activation
ExperimentalModeActivation.description: Toggle Experimental Mode with either buttons on the steering wheel or the screen. Overrides 'Conditional Experimental Mode'.

ExperimentalModeViaLKAS.title: Click LKAS Button
ExperimentalModeViaLKAS.description: Enable/disable 'Experimental Mode' by clicking the 'LKAS' button on your steering wheel.

ExperimentalModeViaTap.title: Double Tap the UI
ExperimentalModeViaTap.description: Enable/disable 'Experimental Mode' by double tapping the onroad UI within a 0.5 second time frame.

ExperimentalModeViaDistance.title: Long Press Distance
ExperimentalModeViaDistance.description: Enable/disable 'Experimental Mode' by holding down the 'distance' button on your steering wheel for 0.5 seconds.

LaneChangeCustomizations.title: Lane Change Customizations
LaneChangeCustomizations.description: Customize the lane change behaviors in openpilot.

LaneChangeTime.title: Lane Change Timer
LaneChangeTime.description: Set a delay before executing a lane change.

LaneDetectionWidth.title: Lane Detection Threshold
LaneDetectionWidth.description: Set the required lane width to be qualified as a lane.

MinimumLaneChangeSpeed.title: Minimum Lane Change Speed
MinimumLaneChangeSpeed.description: Customize the minimum driving speed to allow openpilot to change lanes.

NudgelessLaneChange.title: Nudgeless Lane Change
NudgelessLaneChange.description: Enable lane changes without requiring manual steering input.

OneLaneChange.title: One Lane Change Per Signal
OneLaneChange.description: Only allow one lane change per turn signal activation.

ForceAutoTune.title: Force Auto Tune
ForceAutoTune.description: Forces comma's auto lateral tuning for unsupported vehicles.

NNFF.title: NNFF
NNFF.description: Use Twilsonco's Neural Network Feedforward for enhanced precision in lateral control.

NNFFLite.title: NNFF-Lite
NNFFLite.description: Use Twilsonco's Neural Network Feedforward for enhanced precision in lateral control for cars without available NNFF logs.

SteerRatio.title: Steer Ratio
SteerRatio.description: Use a custom steer ratio as opposed to comma's auto tune value.

TacoTune.title: Taco Tune
TacoTune.description: Use comma's 'Taco Tune' designed for handling left and right turns.

TurnDesires.title: Use Turn Desires
TurnDesires.description: Use turn desires for greater precision in turns below the minimum lane change speed.

LongitudinalTune.title: Longitudinal Tuning
LongitudinalTune.description: Modify openpilot's acceleration and braking behavior.

AccelerationProfile.title: Acceleration Profile
AccelerationProfile.description: Change the acceleration rate to be either sporty or eco-friendly.

DecelerationProfile.title: Deceleration Profile
DecelerationProfile.description: Change the deceleration rate to be either sporty or eco-friendly.

HumanAcceleration.title: Human-Like Acceleration
HumanAcceleration.description: Tweaks the acceleration behavior to be more 'human-like'.

HumanFollowing.title: Human-Like Following Distance
HumanFollowing.description: Tweaks the following distance dynamically to be more 'human-like' when coming up behind slower/stopped leads or following faster leads.

StoppingDistance.title: Increase Stop Distance Behind Lead
StoppingDistance.description: Increase the stopping distance for a more comfortable stop from lead vehicles.

LeadDetectionThreshold.title: Lead Detection Threshold
LeadDetectionThreshold.description: Increase or decrease the lead detection threshold to either detect leads sooner, or increase model confidence.

MTSCEnabled.title: Map Turn Speed Control
MTSCEnabled.description: Slow down for anticipated curves detected by the downloaded maps.

MTSCCurvatureCheck.title: Model Curvature Detection Failsafe
MTSCCurvatureCheck.description: Only trigger MTSC when the model detects a curve in the road. Purely used as a failsafe to prevent false positives. Leave this off if you never experience false positives.

AutomaticallyUpdateModels.title: Automatically Update and Download Models
AutomaticallyUpdateModels.description: Automatically download models as they're updated or added to the model list.

ModelRandomizer.title: Model Randomizer
ModelRandomizer.description: Have a random model be selected each drive that can be reviewed at the end of each drive to find your preferred model.

QOLControls.title: Quality of Life
QOLControls.description: Miscellaneous quality of life changes to improve your overall openpilot experience.

CustomCruise.title: Cruise Increase Interval
CustomCruise.description: Set a custom interval to increase the max set speed by.

CustomCruiseLong.title: Cruise Increase Interval (Long Press)
CustomCruiseLong.description: Set a custom interval to increase the max set speed by when holding down the cruise increase button.

ForceStandstill.title: Force Standstill State
ForceStandstill.description: Keeps openpilot in the 'standstill' state until the gas pedal is pressed.

MapGears.title: Map Accel/Decel To Gears
MapGears.description: Map your acceleration/deceleration profile to your 'Eco' and/or 'Sport' gears.

PauseLateralSpeed.title: Pause Lateral Below
PauseLateralSpeed.description: Pause lateral control on all speeds below the set speed.

ReverseCruise.title: Reverse Cruise Increase
ReverseCruise.description: Reverses the 'long press' functionality logic to increase the max set speed by 5 instead of 1. Useful to increase the max speed quickly.

SetSpeedOffset.title: Set Speed Offset
SetSpeedOffset.description: Set an offset for your desired set speed.

SpeedLimitController.title: Speed Limit Controller
SpeedLimitController.description: Automatically adjust the max speed to match the current speed limit using 'Open Street Maps', 'Navigate On openpilot', or your car's dashboard (Toyotas/Lexus/HKG only).

Offset1.title: Speed Limit Offset (0-34 mph)
Offset1.description: Speed limit offset for speed limits between 0-34 mph.

Offset2.title: Speed Limit Offset (35-54 mph)
Offset2.description: Speed limit offset for speed limits between 35-54 mph.

Offset3.title: Speed Limit Offset (55-64 mph)
Offset3.description: Speed limit offset for speed limits between 55-64 mph.

Offset4.title: Speed Limit Offset (65-99 mph)
Offset4.description: Speed limit offset for speed limits between 65-99 mph.

SLCFallback.title: Fallback Method
SLCFallback.description: Choose your fallback method when there is no speed limit available.

SLCOverride.title: Override Method
SLCOverride.description: Choose your preferred method to override the current speed limit.

SLCPriority1.title: Priority Order - Primary
SLCPriority1.description: Self your primary speed limit priority.

SLCPriority2.title: Priority Order - Secondary
SLCPriority2.description: Self your secondary speed limit priority.

SLCPriority3.title: Priority Order - Tertiary
SLCPriority3.description: Self your tertiary speed limit priority.

SLCConfirmation.title: Confirm New Speed Limits
SLCConfirmation.description: Don't automatically start using the new speed limit until it's been manually confirmed.

ForceMPHDashboard.title: Force MPH From Dashboard Readings
ForceMPHDashboard.description: Force MPH readings from the dashboard. Only use this if you live in an area where the speed limits from your dashboard are in KPH, but you use MPH.

SLCLookaheadHigher.title: Prepare For Higher Speed Limits
SLCLookaheadHigher.description: Set a 'lookahead' value to prepare for upcoming speed limits higher than your current speed limit using the data stored in 'Open Street Maps'.

SLCLookaheadLower.title: Prepare For Lower Speed Limits
SLCLookaheadLower.description: Set a 'lookahead' value to prepare for upcoming speed limits lower than your current speed limit using the data stored in 'Open Street Maps'.

SetSpeedLimit.title: Use Current Speed Limit As Set Speed
SetSpeedLimit.description: Sets your max speed to the current speed limit if one is populated when you initially enable openpilot.

ShowSLCOffset.title: Show Speed Limit Offset
ShowSLCOffset.description: Show the speed limit offset separated from the speed limit in the onroad UI when using 'Speed Limit Controller'.

SpeedLimitChangedAlert.title: Speed Limit Changed Alert
SpeedLimitChangedAlert.description: Trigger an alert whenever the speed limit changes.

UseVienna.title: Use Vienna Speed Limit Signs
UseVienna.description: Use the Vienna (EU) speed limit style signs as opposed to MUTCD (US).

VisionTurnControl.title: Vision Turn Speed Controller
VisionTurnControl.description: Slow down for detected curves in the road.

CurveSensitivity.title: Curve Detection Sensitivity
CurveSensitivity.description: Set curve detection sensitivity. Higher values prompt earlier responses, lower values lead to smoother but later reactions.

TurnAggressiveness.title: Turn Speed Aggressiveness
TurnAggressiveness.description: Set turn speed aggressiveness. Higher values result in faster turns, lower values yield gentler turns.
